is.erle.comms

Class IsErleCommsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactivespaces.activity.impl.ActivitySupport
      • interactivespaces.activity.impl.BaseActivity
        • interactivespaces.activity.impl.ros.BaseRosActivity
          • interactivespaces.activity.impl.ros.BaseRoutableRosActivity
            • is.erle.comms.IsErleCommsActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    interactivespaces.activity.Activity, interactivespaces.activity.ActivityControl, interactivespaces.activity.ros.RosActivity, interactivespaces.activity.SupportedActivity

    public class IsErleCommsActivity
extends interactivespaces.activity.impl.ros.BaseRoutableRosActivity
    This is the communication layer of the project. It will receive data to send from mavlink activity and send it to the drone. Also it will receive data from the drone and it will publish it. Mavlink will process this data and put it on several relevant topics to be used by other activities.

    This activity takes care of the communication with the drone via a UDP port. This receives/transmits messages from/to mavlink activity and then is sent to the drone in the form of bytes.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    Abhay Kumar

      A counter to count the the number of calls sendOutputJson calls.
      private static java.lang.String[] publishers
      The topic names for publishing data PUBLISHER MAPPING publishers[0] -> output Topic Name : comms/output Usage : Send output to the mavlink activity after receiving it from the drone.
      private java.util.Queue<byte[]> responseGlobal
      Stores the data received from the mavlink activity as a FIFO queue and sent to the drone as response after the udp request.
      private static boolean sendFlag
      A flag to check when to send data to the drone.
      private java.util.Date start
      A date instance to check and implement timeout for server response and switch to udpClient.
      private static java.lang.String[] subscribers
      The topic names for subscribing data SUBSCRIBER MAPPING subscribers[0] -> input Topic Name : comms/input Usage : Receive data from mavlink activity and send it to the drone.

      Stores the address of the drone to send data to.
      private interactivespaces.service.comm.network.server.UdpServerNetworkCommunicationEndpoint udpDroneServer
      An instance of UdpServer to receive and send messages to the drone.
